name: Dinosaur bubble shooter ball free mobile game
name_original: Dinosaur bubble shooter ball free mobile game
description:
Bubble Crusher is a match games the way to play it is easy. The number of Bubble used to eliminate Bubble on screen.
Bubble Crusher is a most exciting bubble game with Fun and addiction.
Have fun playing your favorite Bubble crusher game for free!
Crush all Bubble on the screen, and win 3 stars on each level.
Now start your classic Bubble crusher journey!
Bubble crusher is completely free to play, and no in-app purchases.
This is the most classic and amazing shooting ball crusher game, make combinations of 3 or more Bubble to make them burst, collect all the gemesto level up.

The levels seems easy, come and win 3 stars.
Features:
- easy to operate
- it is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time.
- various kinds of props
- Colorful balls
- Easy to learn, but hard to master.

How to play:
1.Tap where you want the Bubble
2.To group 3 or more Bubble to make them burst.
3.Use the limited Bubble and collect all the candy to level up.

Play now, start your Bubble journey, have fun.
